name: orangehrmfrontend
description: This repo is for the autooomation of orangehrm.

scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos && if exist cypress\reports rmdir /q /s cypress\reports
scripts.UiChromeAllureReport: npm run pretest && npm run UiChromeAllure && npx --clean allure generate
scripts.Ui@SmokeAllureReport: npm run pretest && npm run Ui@SmokeAllure && npx --clean allure generate
scripts.Ui@SanityAllureReport: npm run pretest && npm run Ui@SanityAllure && npx --clean allure generate
scripts.apiMochaReport: npx cypress run --env allure=false grep="api scenarios" --headed --browser=chrome
scripts.apiAllureReport: npm run pretest && npm run apiAllure && npx --clean allure generate

author: Mohd Aamir
